title: One cup coffee cafetiere. Makes one cup......of....coffee.
body:
Bought this for a coffee fan. Me.. not so much ( coffee urky). However it does the job well when used with ground coffee.
Only slight complaint would be when the plunger is depressed she says a tiny amount of coffee granules actually pour into the mug upon pouring so maybe filter not quite fine enough to capture smaller coffee particles. Only other thing (which I noticed whilst trying to make her a Barista worthy cup of coffee is that the lid is a little loose. With others I have depressed the plunger several times to ensure coffee is diffused into water sufficiently, however with this model, if you raise the plunger the entire lid comes off as it sits so loosely in the glass jar. However in its defence it works well for 1 cup, and by simply holding the lid down you can raise and depress the plunger until your hand drops off. through over exertion. It does what it needs to do so can't complain too much.
